title: John Green (headmaster)
text:
John Green (born 17 March 1967) is an <a href="England">English</a> schoolmaster and former professional <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player. He is currently Headmaster of <a href="Seaford%20College">Seaford College</a>.
He was educated at <a href="Campion%20School%2C%20Hornchurch">Campion School, Hornchurch</a>, <a href="Cardiff%20University">Cardiff University</a> where he studied Sports Science and completed a Master's degree in Business and Sports Science, and the <a href="Open%20University">Open University</a> (advanced diploma in Economics). He played rugby for <a href="England%20national%20rugby%20union%20team">England</a> U16s, U19s and U23s and played professionally for <a href="Saracens%20F.C.">Saracens</a> from 1992 to 1997. Prior to becoming headmaster of <a href="Seaford%20College">Seaford College</a> in 2013 he was Deputy Head of <a href="Ardingly%20College">Ardingly College</a> Prep School and Director of Sport, and Deputy Head of <a href="Hurstpierpoint%20College">Hurstpierpoint College</a>.
